first_para: Robert Ben Lobban Wallace (born 15 May 1970), known as Ben Wallace, is a British Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Wyre and Preston North since the 2010 General Election, having been the MP for Lancaster and Wyre from 2005 to 2010.

full.extract: Robert Ben Lobban Wallace (born 15 May 1970), known as Ben Wallace, is a British Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Wyre and Preston North since the 2010 General Election, having been the MP for Lancaster and Wyre from 2005 to 2010.
full.title: Ben Wallace (politician)
